title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Daily viewing time in minutes, with a total of 23 data points.
Overall Daily viewing time in minutes has increased over the Year.

Daily viewing time in minutes is gradually increasing from 1997 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, slightly increasing from 2003 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2017, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Max Daily viewing time in minutes about 225.0 was recorded at Year 2011
Min Daily viewing time in minutes about 183.0 was recorded at Year 1997
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Daily viewing time in minutes, with a total of 23 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 1999 to 2008.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008 to 2013.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2013 to 2016.
